subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Frank Thomas hit three home runs last night to lead the host Toronto Blue Jays past the Boston Red Sox, 6-1, raising his total to 512 and tying Ernie Banks and Eddie Mathews for 18th on the career list.
snippet: Frank Thomas hit three home runs last night to lead the host Toronto Blue Jays past the Boston Red Sox, 6-1, raising his total to 512 and tying Ernie Banks and Eddie Mathews for 18th on the career list.
